Topic.Title: DELL is a BUY form here

Message.Msg: It went down after the QE3 announcement on Thursday. Weird for going up the day after. I bought 1500 shares at 10.58 and sold at 10.86, so I came away with a decent profit. I was going long on it, but decided to sell after reading up on their lack of vision, especially their failure to offer services in the cloud.

Topic.Title: DELL is a BUY form here

Message.Msg: Had DELL at $14.00 before..I will wait for this price...
